name: Transport Approved
description:
Message from manager:

Take a training program at a Transportation Agency.

Decide whether to approve given transport of goods or no in this fast paced game. You'll gonna not gonna have much time for making a decision, and you'll also need to be very careful, because every mistake might mean back to the beginning.

Master your decision skills and complete the program.

It's gonna be fun. I hope.

Best regards.
